subject: Re: [junit] missing junit.jar in Ant1.8.2
msgSnippet: https://github.com/downloads/KentBeck/junit/junit-4.8.2.jar should work fine.  Good luck! David Saff
messageBody:
https://github.com/downloads/KentBeck/junit/junit-4.8.2.jar should
work fine. Good luck!

David Saff

On Mon, May 23, 2011 at 11:58 AM, lewismc2 <lewis.mcgibbney@...> wrote:
> Hi list,
>
> Having read the content here [1] I realise that I am missing 'junit.jar' from my ant dist. I am unsure of what to package to download and add to my /lib dir within ant.
>
> Any suggestions please?
>
> Thanks
>
> Lewis
